memberdef.name: GET_PYTHIA_EVENT
memberdef.initializer: void NAME(HEPUtils::Event& result) \ { \ using namespace Pipes::NAME; \ generateEventPy8Collider(result, *Dep::RunMC, \ *Dep::HardScatteringSim, *Dep::EventWeighterFunction, \ *Loop::iteration, Loop::wrapup,runOptions); \ }

briefdescription.para: Generate a hard scattering event with a specific Pythia,.

detaileddescription.para: ColliderBit event loop functions returning collider Monte Carlo events.
